## SynQLite.getTableIdColumn() method

Get the column used as identifier for the [SyncableTable](./synqlite-node.syncabletable.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getTableIdColumn(params: GetTableIdColumnParams): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  params | [GetTableIdColumnParams](./synqlite-node.gettableidcolumnparams.md) | Details of table for which to retrieve ID column. |

**Returns:**
